valueProps.text: Unlocking physical intelligence for new frontiers
Accelerating embedded development with CodeFusion Studio

pains: Need for efficient embedded development tools

facts.evidence: Explore how ADI is unlocking physical intelligence.

facts.text: ADI enables new frontiers in autonomous factories, intelligent robotics, software-defined vehicles, and predictive healthcare systems.
facts.evidence: Enabling new frontiers in autonomous factories, intelligent robotics, software-defined vehicles, and predictive healthcare systems.

facts.text: ADI offers a suite of software solutions, design tools, and expert resources.
facts.evidence: Simplify complexity and speed up system development with a suite of software solutions, design tools, and expert resources.

facts.text: ADI's software solutions help simplify complexity and speed up system development.
facts.evidence: Simplify complexity and speed up system development with a suite of software solutions.

facts.text: CodeFusion Studio unifies multicore management, debug, and resource plan in one open-source, VS Code–based IDE.
facts.evidence: Unify multicore management, debug, and resource plan in one open-source, VS Code–based IDE.

facts.text: ADI co-creates solutions across multiple industries.
facts.evidence: Together, with our customers, we co-create solutions across aerospace, automotive, communications, consumer, energy, industrial automation, and healthcare.

facts.text: ADI provides solutions for military communications addressing size, weight, power, and cost challenges.
facts.evidence: Amplify your secure military comms by addressing size, weight, power, and cost challenges for handheld, shipborne, and vehicle radios.

facts.text: ADI offers solutions for guidance, navigation, flight control, data acquisition, power distribution, engine control, and motor control systems.
facts.evidence: Elevate your next innovations in guidance, navigation, flight control, data acquisition, power distribution, engine control, and motor control systems.

facts.text: ADI provides superior beamforming, RF and microwave, data conversion, precision linear, and power systems for space technology.
facts.evidence: Superior beamforming, RF and microwave, data conversion, precision linear, and power systems for LEO, GEO, and beyond.
